title: 30 fps stuck problem
body: For some reason my fps is stuck at 30 even though i have it on uncapped and im using a really strong laptop. What can i do to fix this problem?

replies.body:
Hop into your **VIDEO** settings in-game and ensure you have *vertical sync* set to **disabled**. If you still see this issue, I'd recommend going through [**this guide**](http://www.tenforums.com/tutorials/8637-game-bar-turn-off-windows-10-a.html) to ensure the Windows Game Bar and the *Game DVR* feature are not enabled (if you're on Win 10), as they've caused FPS issues in the past.

Let me know if this helped! :D
it helped, thanks man, appreciate it
